title: Start
body:
<<show Background intro>>

<<walk Horse left>>

Hello, and welcome to this wonderful digital game experience. We on the Terrible Gramphics team hope you enjoy learning about horse-related romantic activities.

[[Pick.Gender]]

title: Pick.Gender
body:
I was wondering, what is your gender?

[[Girl|Pick.Gender.Girl]]
[[Boy|Pick.Gender.Boy]]
[[Apple|Pick.Gender.Apple]]

title: Pick.Gender.Girl
body:
<<set $isGirl to 1>>

Ok Miss!!!

[[Pick.Horse.Intro]]

title: Pick.Gender.Boy
body:
<<set $isBoy to 1>>

Ok, mister!!!

[[Pick.Horse.Intro]]

title: Pick.Gender.Apple
body:
<<set $isApple to 1>>

Woof, might be need to be careful around these horses, then.

They might get... bitey...

[[Pick.Horse.Intro]]

title: End
body:
<<if $isApple is 1>>
    Well, let's take our first bite, apple!!
<<elseif $isGirl is 1>>
    Well, let's get on with it, miss!!
<<elseif $isBoy is 1>>
    Well, let's get on with it, mister!
<<endif>>

<<walk Horse left>>

<<show Background main>>

<<run Dialog field>>

title: Pick.Horse.Intro
body:
Next, we need to pick which horse to woo!

We have quite the spread of choices, hopefully there's one you like!


[[Pick.Horse]]

title: Pick.Horse
body:
Pick a horse!!!

[[Regular Brown Horse|Confirm.Brown]]
[[Special Striped Horse|Confirm.Striped]]
[[Bancho Tough Horse|Confirm.Bancho]]

title: Confirm.Brown
body:
<<set $horse to "brown">>

<<walk Horse center>>
<<switch Horse brown>>

Regular Brown Horse.
Likes: Apples
Dislikes: Spurs

Is this your choice?

[[Horse.Confirm]]

title: Confirm.Striped
body:
<<set $horse to "striped">>

<<walk Horse center>>
<<switch Horse striped>>

Special Striped Horse
Likes: Hay
Dislikes: Getting Wet

[[Horse.Confirm]]

title: Confirm.Bancho
body:
<<set $horse to "bancho">>

<<walk Horse center>>
<<switch Horse bancho>>

Bancho Tough Horse
Likes: Violence, Money
Dislikes: Apples

[[Horse.Confirm]]

title: Deny.Horse
body:
Well in that case...

<<walk Horse left>>

[[Pick.Horse]]

title: Horse.Picked
body:
Hmm... "$horse", what a good choice!

<<vibrate Horse>>

[[End]]

title: Horse.Confirm
body:
Is this your choice?

[[Yes|Horse.Picked]]
[[No|Deny.Horse]]

title: Field
body:
Alright! Here we are! An idyllic field. Perfect for meeting a horse.

<<fade SmallHorse in>>

There's figure in the distance, grazing. Could it be? Your dream horse?

[[Slow Approach|Approach.Slow]]
[[Sprint At Horse Screaming|Approach.Fast]]


<<if $isApple is 1>>
    [[Act Natural|Approach.Apple]]
<<else>>
    [[Pretend to be an Apple|Approach.Apple]]
<<endif>>

title: Approach.Slow
body:
<<set $approach to "slow">>

You slowly and quietly approach the horse, making sure not to spook them...

[[Approach.Picked.Branch]]

title: Approach.Fast
body:
<<shake Screen>>

<<set $approach to "fast">>

YOU RUN AND SCREAM AT THE HORSE TO ESTABLISH DOMINENCE.

[[Approach.Picked.Branch]]

title: Approach.Apple
body:
<<set $approach to "apple">>

You curl up into a ball and try to look as red and applish as you can. 

The horse approaches.

[[Approach.Picked.Branch]]

title: Approach.Picked.Branch
body:
<<if $horse == "horse">>
    [[Approach.Picked]]
<<else>>
    [[Approach.NotPicked]]
<<endif>>

title: Approach.Picked
body:
It's the brown horse. So stunning, in their beauty. You wonder how it's possible
Anything could be so horse, or so brown.

[[Approach.Effect.Branch]]

title: Approach.NotPicked
body:
Oh, it's the brown horse. It turns out your previous choice didn't matter.
The cracks are appearing in the illusion of choice, oh no!!!

[[Approach.Effect.Branch]]

title: Approach.Effect.Branch
body:
<<if $approach == "slow">>
    [[Approach.Effect.Slow]]
<<elseif $approach == "fast">>
    [[Approach.Effect.Fast]]
<<elseif $approach == "apple">>
    [[Approach.Effect.Apple]]
<<endif>>

// gonna throw a default here in case it isn't set right
[[Approach.Effect.Slow]]

title: Approach.Effect.Slow
Approach.Effect.Fast
Approach.Effect.Apple
body:
The horse approaches you and starts licking you. 

You find this quite enjoyable, until they bite your head off and you die. 

Being an apple near a horse is a very dangerous game.

BAD END.

title: Offer.Gift
body:
You decide to further woo this horse with a little gift. Now which one to pickâ€¦

<<show gift_choices>>

title: Offer.Apple
body: They like your gift

title: Offer.Hat
body: They like your gift

title: Offer.Baby
body: They like your gift
